#summary This article contains the user manual for the load track activity
#labels Phase-Support

= Introduction =

In this screen the user can view a list of all recorded tracks. The user can also view details, delete, rename and load tracks.

= Details =

The following screen shows the screen as it should appear to the user when he enters it:

<img src="http://swp-dv-ws2010-osm-1.googlecode.com/svn/wiki/img/manual_loadtrack_full.png" height="40%" width="40%"/>

The text box at the top lets the user search for tracks. If he enters a part of a track name then only tracks that contain this part are displayed in the list below.

The large part of the screen contains a list of all recorded tracks. If there is no recorded track, then the list will be empty.
